item.title: Watch The Official Trailer For Mike Ho's New Psychological Thriller Persona
item.description: Exclusive: Screen Rant presents the official trailer for Mike Ho's new psychological thriller Persona, which stars Shanti Lowry, Sophia Ali, and more.

item.title: Weird Tim Burton Theory Connects 2 Winona Ryder Led Movies
item.description: One Tim Burton theory suggests a familiar connection between two of Winona Ryder's characters, but some key details can play against it.

item.title: Waltzing With Brando Trailer: Billy Zane Uncannily Embodies Marlon Brando In A Tale Of The Oscar-Winning Actor's Biggest Gamble
item.description: The Waltzing with Brando trailer shows Billy Zane uncannily embodying Marlon Brando in a tale of the two-time Oscar-winning actor's biggest gamble.
